sentence.Network_en: She does like to have the last word in any discussion.
sentence.Network_cn: 她确实喜欢商量什么事都最终自己说了算。

sentence.Network_en: They sat me down and had a serious discussion about sex.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们让我坐下，然后和我严肃地探讨了有关性的话题。

sentence.Network_en: In Britain, the growing discussion of women's sexuality raised its own disquiet.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国，对女性性欲的讨论日趋高涨，使得这一讨论本身就开始引起了不安。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting judicial examination): via Old French from late Latin discussio(n-), from discutere 'investigate' (see discuss)

entry.def: If there is discussion about something, people talk about it, often in order to reach a decision.

example.ex: There was a lot of discussion about the wording of the report...
example.tran: 关于此则报道的措辞议论纷纷。

example.ex: Council members are due to have informal discussions later on today...
example.tran: 委员会成员定于今日晚些时候进行非正式讨论。

entry.def: A discussion of a subject is a piece of writing or a lecture in which someone talks about it in detail.

example.ex: For a discussion of biology and sexual politics, see chapter 4.
example.tran: 生态政治和性别政治论述请见第4章。

entry.def: A discussion document or paper is one that contains information and usually proposals for people to discuss.

means.word_mean: 1. an extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic;

sentences.sentence: "the book contains an excellent discussion of modal logic"
"his treatment of the race question is badly biased"

means.word_mean: 2. an exchange of views on some topic;

sentences.sentence: "we had a word or two about it"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"某种物,用品;人等"; 2. 表名词,"动作或状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accord和谐+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.手风琴
carr=carn肉+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.腐肉
champ+ion人→n.冠军,拥护者,战士
cush垫+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.垫子,软垫
manse住宅+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.大厦,大楼;宅第
product产品+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.生产,产品,作品
scorp原意为一种鱼,后指蝎子+ion某种物,用品;人等→n.蝎子
dismiss解散;开除+ion动作或状态等→n.免职,解雇,不予考虑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 允许进入,承认某事之陈述,供认
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+miss送+ion动作或状态等→送来→许可进入
concise简明的+ion动作或状态等→n.简明,简洁
console安慰+at+ion动作或状态等→n.安慰,慰藉
contradict反驳,矛盾+ion动作或状态等→n.反驳,矛盾
create创造+ion动作或状态等→n.创造,创作物
dilapidate倒塌+ion动作或状态等→n.破旧,荒废

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
stems_affixes.word_buile: discriminate歧视+ion动作或状态等→n.辨别,区别,识别力,辨别力,歧视
discuss讨论+ion动作或状态等→n.讨论,谈论;论述
edit编辑+ion状态→在以前的基础编辑后→版本,版
expanse膨胀扩张+ion动作或状态等→n.扩张,膨胀;张开,伸展
frict摩擦+ion动作或状态等→n.摩擦,摩擦力
lucubrate用功,深入研究+ion动作或状态等→n.刻苦研究

stems_affixes.value_cn: 航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
stems_affixes.word_buile: navigate航行,航海,导航+ion动作或状态等→n.航海,航空,导航,领航,航行
obligate有责任的+ion动作或状态等→n.义务,责任
obsess迷住,使困扰+ion动作或状态等→n.迷住,困扰
pollute弄脏,污染+ion动作或状态等→污染,玷污

stems_affixes.value_cn: 持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: possess占有,拥有+ion动作或状态等→n.持有,拥有;所有权;所有物;[n.]财产,财富
receipt收据,收到+ion动作或状态等→n.接待,招待会,接收
situate使处于+ion动作或状态等→n.情形,境遇

Sentence.sentence: As a bonus, professors can even chime in (插话 ) on discussions.
The author is most excited about Inkling's notation system because one canparticipate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.
participate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.

But there is also time for brief diversions onto bizarre ground, such as a discussion of the skyscraper index (which holds that a boom in skyscraper construction is a foolproof sign of an imminent recessio.

I think they do better academically and you can measure that very crudely from the examination results,I also think they do better academically because they have more opportunities to take the leading role in discussions and in managerial responsibilities.

sentences.en: We devoted a lengthy and full discussion to this topic.
sentences.cn: 我们对这个题目进行了长时间的充分讨论。

sentences.en: That is a plan under discussion.
sentences.cn: 那是一个正在讨论中的计划。

jushi.english: Discussion was going on among the students about the ideal.
jushi.chinese: 在学生中间进行了一场有关理想问题的讨论。

jushi.english: The question gave rise to much discussion.
jushi.chinese: 这个问题引起了不少的议论。

jushi.english: We had an animated discussion over current events last evening.
jushi.chinese: 昨天晚上我们热烈地讨论时事。
